title: MBTI Personality Assessment
description: A comprehensive Myers-Briggs Type Indicator assessment to determine your personality type across four dimensions

instructions.general: This assessment consists of 64 questions designed to identify your personality preferences. There are no right or wrong answers - choose the response that best describes your natural tendencies.
instructions.format: Each question has multiple choice options. Select the response that feels most natural to you in most situations.
instructions.scoring: Your responses will be scored across four dimensions: Extraversion/Introversion (E/I), Sensing/Intuition (S/N), Thinking/Feeling (T/F), and Judging/Perceiving (J/P). Your dominant preferences will determine your personality type.
instructions.types: Your final type will be a combination of your preferences: 16 personality types (e.g., ENFP, ISTJ, etc.)

EI.name: Extraversion vs Introversion
EI.description: How you direct and receive energy. Extraverts gain energy from external interaction, while Introverts gain energy from internal reflection.

SN.name: Sensing vs Intuition
SN.description: How you gather and process information. Sensing types prefer concrete, factual information, while Intuitive types prefer abstract concepts and possibilities.

TF.name: Thinking vs Feeling
TF.description: How you make decisions. Thinking types focus on logical analysis and objective criteria, while Feeling types focus on values and impact on people.

JP.name: Judging vs Perceiving
JP.description: How you approach the outer world. Judging types prefer structure, plans, and closure, while Perceiving types prefer flexibility, spontaneity, and keeping options open.

options.text: Seek out conversations and engage with many people
Prefer deeper conversations with a few close friends

questions.question: When learning something new, I prefer to:

options.text: Start with practical examples and step-by-step details
Understand the big picture and underlying concepts first

questions.question: When making decisions, I primarily consider:

options.text: I prefer to complete tasks early and stick to my schedule
I work best under pressure and prefer to keep options open

scoring.description: Each answer is scored based on the selected value. Tally the responses for each dimension to determine your personality type.

interpretation.EI: If E > I: Extraversion, If I > E: Introversion
interpretation.SN: If S > N: Sensing, If N > S: Intuition
interpretation.TF: If T > F: Thinking, If F > T: Feeling
interpretation.JP: If J > P: Judging, If P > J: Perceiving
